title: Will studying late at night affect the health of a normal student? - Quora

response.answer_text: No as long as sleep of atleast 6 to 8 hrs is completed and the late night sessions are not carried out everyday, it wont affect health much. Remember, moderation is the key here. Also try to avoid Coffee, it really messes up entire sleep cycle. Try eating apples, they are better at keeping you awake (not kidding, do read it up).

It depends on person. Some people can't study late night. They should not forcefully try this. It will affect their health. Also some people need more sleep and some less. You should listen to your body. Everyone has different sleep cycles. If your body is comfortable with late night studies you should do it.
